title: BlockchainSpace
author: BlockchainSpace
content: Hey Folks üéâBlockchain Spaceü™ê will hold an AMA with KaraStar on June 13th at 12:00PM UTC ¬†üéäüí∞Total Reward Pool - $100A pioneering gamer-driven multi-chain metaverse game on BSC!üìå Rules to follow :‚úÖ Join  KaraStar Telegram Group & Channel ‚úÖ Join Blockchain Space Telegram Group & Channel ‚úÖ Follow KaraStar on Twitter ‚úÖ Follow Blockchain Space on Twitter We will have the following structure:Part 1Ô∏è‚É£: $50/5 users ‚Äì We‚Äôll select 5 questions from the community. A user can post maximum 2 questions. 3 Questions will be selected from our Twitter ‚Äì please submit your questions in the comments section of  this post  and 2 random questions will be selected from Bitcointalk thread, please post your questions in this thread. Only 1 post is allowed per user (2 questions can be written in 1 post)Don't plagiarize, create original questions by researching to avoid being banned by the bitcointalk moderators.Part 2Ô∏è‚É£: $50/5 users ‚Äì Open chat for 120 seconds. You can post Max 2 questions. KaraStar Team will select 5 questions and answer them.üìöResearch KaraStar Projectüåê Website ‚ìÇÔ∏è Medium¬† ü¶é CoinGecko
